title: [Large-scale] Teacher Education Design for Enhancing Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital technology skills and foundational pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Designed for pre-service teachers to acquire information literacy and digital teaching skills in smartphone-based environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the ability to evaluate and select reliable information in digital environments.
Learners can apply an interactive mobile device-based instructional design process.
Learners can integrate an AHP model-based information literacy education design framework into educational settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
